donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
The project supports consolidation of the Directly Observed Treatment Short-course (DOTS) framework through strengthening programme management, improving TB case detection and diagnosis and ensuring quality treatment.
Also, it contributes to improving health system performance for effective TB control as well as ensures introduction of and expands access to diagnosis and treatment of drug-resistant tuberculosis.

project_descr: Purposeful Strengthening and Expanding of Qualified Services on Tuberculosis Diagnostics and Treatment in Turkmenistan
project_title: Diagnostics and Treatment of TB in Turkmenistan
